column4: does anyone know of a fix for remote desktop on jaunty where the target computer doesn't refresh the screen?  for example i click on a button, don't see anything, but if i disconnect and reconnect the action occured fine
yea thats VNC
honestly VNC sucks I would go with nx
nx?
even better, nx uses ssh natively
yes, linux os x solaris windows etc
no idea tbh
tbh?
to be honest
thanks
the service is still there, but i can't ssh into any of my user accounts
trying to setup FreeNx, and getting weird issues, could not connect to NX server
nx uses its own ssh username & keys, then it su's to the user you want
nice i just got locked out of my machine.  everytime i try to login, i get a too many authentication failures
what do you mean? you got locked out from the server machine?
meaning i was SSH'ed into the machine when i tried to run the setup, and when i restarted the SSH process, i can't login anymore ( with any of the account si have on the machine )
it royally messed up my SSH, no way in anymore.  have to wait to get home to try and UNDO from the actual console.  even my gitosis setup got fried
that doesnt make any sense. nx should use the existing ssh service
but like you said it inserts itself into the process, so now none of my users can login that way.
no what it does is create a nx user and the client logs in through that, but it shouldnt mess with anything
ok, but it did.  i will check when i get home.
